---
description: Architecture documentation for VS Code Agent Sessions workbench layout. Use when working in `src/vs/sessions`
applyTo: src/vs/sessions/**
---

# Agent Sessions Layout

The Agent Sessions workbench has a dedicated layout system with a fixed structure defined in a specification document. When working on files under `src/vs/sessions/`, use the `agent-sessions-layout` skill for detailed guidance on the layout architecture, supported operations, and implementation requirements.
